emiting.label: Sending
emiting.noGm: A GM must be online in order to enact this request.

manage.name: Manage Condition
manage.hint: Key held when dropping a condition to manage its duration.

teleport.name: Teleport Tokens
teleport.hint: Key held while clicking on the scene to teleport all selected tokens.

unselect.name: Teleport Tokens (Unselect)
unselect.hint: Key held while clicking on the scene to teleport all selected tokens. Also unselect the tokens when pressing the keybind to give an unobstructed vision over the whole scene.

droppeth.name: Droppeth Modifier
droppeth.hint: Key held when dropping an item on the ground.

action.name: Action Macro
action.hint: Adds a way to link a macro to actions/feats.

apply.name: Auto Self-Applied
apply.hint: The use button for self-applied effect will automatically apply the effect.

item.name: Item Macro
item.hint: Adds a way to link a macro to equipment & consumable items.

physical.name: Physical Actions
physical.hint: Adds a new RuleElement that generates virtual actions whenever a physical item is equipped/invested.

spell.name: Spell Macro
spell.hint: Adds a way to link a macro to spells.

use.name: Use Consumable
use.hint: Will add an extra 'use' button for consumables and generate a custom message when used.

action.name: Anonymize NPC Actions
action.hint: Actions sent to chat by a non-player owned actor will be anonymized for players.

spell.name: Anonymize NPC Spells
spell.hint: Spells casted by a non-player owned actor will be anonymized for players.

traits.name: Show Traits
traits.hint: When the module anonymize a message, should traits still be displayed.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world use this Variant. It automatically updates weapons and armors giving them fundamental runes/improvements at the appropriate level.

force.name: Force Update
force.hint: When enabled, the runes/grade will always be updated based on actor level. When disabled only the runes/grade that are currently at a lower value than what they should be for that level will be upgraded.

price.name: No Rune/Improvement Price
price.hint: Should fundamental rune/improvement prices be subtracted from the weapon price.

remove.name: Remove-Effect Shortcut
remove.hint: Using [Shift + Right Click] on effect icons in the effects-panel will instantly remove all their charges/counters/badges.

coins.name: Weightless Coins
coins.hint: Coins are weightless in the inventory.

dropped.name: No Dropped Bulk
dropped.hint: Dropped equipment in an actor's inventory won't be accounted for bulk value calculation.

improvised.name: Improvised Weapon Button
improvised.hint: Add a button in the inventory of character actors to create an improvised weapon on the fly.

mergeItems.name: Items Merging Button
mergeItems.hint: Add a merge button in the inventory tab to merging stacks of items.

partyAsObserved.name: Party Alliance as Observed
partyAsObserved.hint: Allow players to observe actor sheets while having the 'Limited' permission as long as they belong to the 'party' alliance. Not to be confused with the 'Party' actor.

splitItem.name: Allow Item Split
splitItem.hint: Click on the item quantity number in an actor sheet to split it into multiple entries.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Add custom functionalities to the default system merchant.

teleport.name: Teleport Tokens
teleport.hint: Clicking on the board while holding the defined keybind will instantly teleport the selected tokens to location without any travel.

history.name: No History Record
history.hint: Should movement history recording be prevented for you. This makes successive move actions in a same turn less confusing.

partyAsObserved.name: Party Alliance as Observed
partyAsObserved.hint: Allow players to observe actor sheets while having the 'Limited' permission as long as they belong to the 'party' alliance. Not to be confused with the 'Party' actor.

scribble.name: Handwritten Character Sheet
scribble.hint: A restyling of the character sheet to appear as it was written by hand.

showPlayers.name: Show Avatar to Players
showPlayers.hint: Adds a 'Show Players' button in the actor sheets avatar panel.

sortList.name: Sort List Button
sortList.hint: Adds sorting buttons to different lists on the actor sheet.

target.name: Auto Target
target.hint: When placing a template on the board, a new dialog will show up allowing you to target all the tokens inside it.

invertTrade.name: Invert Trade Modifier
invertTrade.hint: Players will no longer have to hold 'shift' to give an item without initiating a trade. (Holding 'shift' will initiate the trade request)

unscaleTokenHUD.name: Unscale Token HUD
unscaleTokenHUD.hint: Revert the canvas scaling of the token HUD

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Allow users to import a character from pathbuilder through steps.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Drag a condition while holding the defined keybind to open the condition manager allowing you to set its duration.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Allow users to drop items on the canvas by holding the assigned key.

light.name: Light Source
light.hint: Should the dropped item emit light. It will only be the case if a single item is present in the loot actor.

effect.name: Effects/Conditions
effect.hint: Should players be able to drop effects & conditions onto actors they do not own.

count.name: Hero Set Variant
count.hint: If 0, characters can only have one hero action per hero point. Otherwise, the number of hero actions will be dissociated from the number of hero points available and characters will redraw hero actions in set.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world use the Hero Point Deck actions.

private.name: Private Draw
private.hint: Make the message generated when drawing hero actions private instead. If enabled, trades will be blind to all participants.

table.name: Table UUID
table.hint: Unique identifier of the table you want to use in your world. To get the UUID of a table (in a compendium or in the Rollable Tables directory), simply open the table and Left-Click on ðŸ“” next to its name.

trade.name: Allow Trade
trade.hint: When enabled, characters will be able to trade actions with one another.

delay.name: 24 Hours Delay
delay.hint: When enabled, a character will need to wait 24h after failing to identify an item before being able to make another attempt. Otherwise it will be reset on the next day date.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Will help you manage unidentified items in your world and keep track of which items are identified.

identifyPartials.name: Auto Identify Similar Items
identifyPartials.hint: Should 'similar' items also be identified when using the 'Automatically identify known items' option.

playerRequest.name: Allow Player Request
playerRequest.hint: Should players be able to request identification of items.

merge.name: Merge Button
merge.hint: Adds a button to damage messages allowing them to be merged with other damage messages.

inject.name: Inject Button
inject.hint: Adds a button to damage messages allowing them to be injected to a previous damage message.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Enable this tool in your world. The tracker can be toggled on/off via controls on the left UI.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Track rolls to see if your players are really that unlucky.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Actors will be able to link/share their data with one another.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Enable the 'Target Helper' feature in your world.

small.name: Small Damage Buttons
small.hint: Reduce the size of damage buttons for the extra targets.

targets.name: Add Targets to Messages
targets.hint: Will add extra targets to chat messages where damage can be applied and saves can be rolled.

checks.name: Upgrade Checks Messages
checks.hint: Upgrades the simple inline save messages into something that can be used by the feature. Also adds more details to it.

alpha.name: Opacity
alpha.hint: Opacity value when the token has a negative elevation.

contrast.name: Contrast
contrast.hint: Contrast value when the token has a negative elevation.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Will allow tokens with negative elevation to remain visible on the board.

mode.name: Applied Filter
mode.hint: Which type of filter should be applied to tokens with a negative elevation.

tiles.name: Background Tiles
tiles.hint: Scene tiles with an elevation of 0 or less will always be drawn behind tokens with negative elevation. NOTE that this might conflict with other modules that also work with tiles.

create.name: On Item Creation
create.hint: Automatically set the un-identified image of items to be the same as the regular image when the item is created/imported.

update.name: On Item Update
update.hint: Automatically update the un-identified image when the item's regular image is updated.

action.label: Self-Applied Effect / Macro
action.hint: A single effect item to be applied to the actor that uses this action or a macro that will be executed when this action is used
action.cancel: {name} action was cancelled by its macro.

item.label: Macro
item.hint: A macro that will be executed when this item is used
item.cancel: {name} usage was cancelled by its macro.

spell.label: Macro
spell.hint: A macro that will be executed when this spell is cast
spell.cancel: {name} cast was cancelled by its macro.

actionable.virtual: This is a virtual action added by:

merge.none: There are no items to merge in the inventory.
merge.title: Merge Items - {name}

browserFilter.empty: No point on creating a filter without .. filters.

browserPull.finished: Items have finished being added to the merchant actor.
browserPull.owned: This item is already in the merchant's inventory
browserPull.title: Add Items - {name}
browserPull.wait: Please wait for the items to be processed.

delete.title: Delete Filter
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this Filter?

filtersMenu.title: Item Filters - {name}
filtersMenu.treasure: Treasures reaching this filter will always be bought for 100% of their price

importServices.title: Import Services - {name}
importServices.error: An error occurred while trying to import the services.

buy.noTarget: You must select a valid actor to buy from this merchant

item.error: An error occurred while trying to process a better merchant item trade: {reason}.
item.noStock: {actor} cannot provide the requested quantity of {item}.

sell.prompt: Does {actor} wish to sell this item?
sell.title: Sell {item}

item.unided: Nobody sane would want to buy some random unidentified item.

infiniteAll.label: Infinite Stocks
infiniteAll.tooltip: The merchant will never run out of items to sell (does nothing to Treasures or Services)

sellItems.noSelection: You must select a valid selling actor.

sellItems.empty: {name} doesn't seem to be interested by anything you would have to offer.
sellItems.info: The following prices are colored based on an assumed ratio of <u>{treasure}</u> for treasures and <u>{item}</u> for the other items.
sellItems.title: Sell Items - {name}

sheetServices.copied: {name} services have been copied to clipboard.
sheetServices.label: Services

service.error: An error occurred while trying to process a better merchant service ({service}) : {reason}.
service.give: {seller} offers their services to {buyer} free of charge.
service.noBuyer: You must select one Character/NPC/Party you own as the target of the service.
service.noFunds: {buyer} doesn't have the funds to hire the services of {seller}.
service.unwilling: {seller} isn't willing to offer that service anymore.

delete.title: Delete Service
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this Service?

serviceMenu.error: An error occurred while trying to process the service request
serviceMenu.give: {seller} offers their services to {buyer} free of charge.
serviceMenu.name: Name
serviceMenu.noBuyer: You must select one Character/NPC/Party you own as the target of the service.
serviceMenu.noFunds: {buyer} doesn't have the funds to hire the services of {seller}.
serviceMenu.title: Service - {label}

error.no-scene: There is no scene available to droppeth.
error.quantity: You can only droppeth item with quantity greater than 0.

error.onlyCharacter: Hero Actions is only compatible with Character actors
error.notEnoughPoint: The character doesn't have enough hero points
error.noDetails: Could not find the details for this Hero Action.
error.noAction: The character doesn't have any Hero Action.
error.mustDiscard: The character must discard {nb} actions to engage in a trade.
error.noOther: There is no other character with Hero Actions available to trade with.
error.notGM: You need to be a GM to give Hero Actions.

table.notFound: No Hero Point Deck table could be found in this world.
table.noFormulaCompendium: The Hero Deck table has no formula and is a compendium table.
table.drawError: An error occurred during the draw of a Hero Action, the table may contain non-conform results.

mergeDamage.injected: Damage was injected into this message
mergeDamage.noMatch: Couldn't find another matching damage message.

timeout.label: Timeout (seconds)
timeout.tooltip: Time passed in your world before the resource value is decremented by 1

controls.session: Players will not see any new result until the session ends

paused.label: Recording is Paused
paused.tooltip: No roll is being recorded in your world

session.label: Currently in Session
session.tooltip: No new result will be shown until the current session is over

clear.title: Clear Records
clear.hint: Do you want to clear any record up to this date?

armorRunes.label: Armor Runes
armorRunes.hint: Use the master's invested armor/bracers potency & resilient runes.

health.label: Health Pool
health.hint: Share health & stamina points with its master.

languages.label: Languages
languages.hint: Add master's languages to this actor.

master.label: Master
master.hint: Select a master with whom this actor will share data.

skills.label: Skills Proficiencies & Modifiers
skills.hint: Use the master's skills proficiencies. Also add the master's item modifiers for skills and perception.

spellcasting.label: Spellcasting
spellcasting.hint: Use the master's spellcasting statistic and it's focus pool.

timeEvents.label: Time Events
timeEvents.hint: Whenever the master's turn starts/ends or initiative changes, the events will also be triggered for this actor. It will also use the master to calculate remaining duration for effects.

config.title: Shared Data - {name}
config.unable: This actor is unable to be linked to a master.

weaponRunes.label: Weapon Runes
weaponRunes.hint: Use the master's invested handwraps/weapon fundamental & property runes.

undo.msg: HP damage cannot be reverted from a bound actor and must be done manually.

drop.added: You have successfully added a save to the message.
drop.already: This message already has a save check linked to it.
drop.unauth: You can only do that on messages you are the author of.

merge.none: Could not find a suitable damage message to merge with.
